/usr/bin/c++   -O3 -DNDEBUG -arch i386 -arch x86_64 -isysroot /Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.6.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/Sample-NiUserTracker.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Sample-NiUserTracker.dir/SceneDrawer.cpp.o  -o Sample-NiUserTracker  ../../Source/OpenNI/libOpenNI.dylib -framework glut -framework OpenGL ../../../../../../Source/External/LibUSB/Mac/libusb-1.0.a /usr/lib/libdl.dylib ../../Source/External/TinyXml/libTinyXml.dylib -framework CoreFoundation -framework IOKit
